00016 // the CAlgorithm class -------------------------------------------------------+
00017 class CAlgorithm {
00018 public:
00019         CAlgorithm(): m_bRunning(false) { }
00020         virtual ~CAlgorithm() { }
00021 
00022         virtual void Init(CViData *viData) = 0;
00023         virtual void Step() = 0;
00024         virtual void Stop() = 0;
00025 
00026         void Pause() { m_bRunning = false; }
00027         void Resume() { m_bRunning = true; }
00028 
00029         const char *GetName() { return m_strName; }
00030         bool IsRunning() { return m_bRunning; }
00031 
00032         template <class T> static void Exchange(T &a, T &b) { T t = a; a = b; b = t; ++m_iExchanges; }
00033         template <class T> static void CompExch(T &a, T &b) { if (IsBigger(a, b)) Exchange(a, b); }
00034         template <class T> static void CompExch2(T &a, T &b) { if (IsLittler(a, b)) Exchange(a, b); }
00035         template <class T> static bool IsBigger(T &a, T &b) { ++m_iComparisions; return (a > b); }
00036         template <class T> static bool IsLittler(T &a, T &b) { ++m_iComparisions; return (a < b); }
00037         static void NextIteration() { ++m_iIterations; }
00038         static void NexChange() { ++m_iExchanges; }
00039         
00040         static int GetNumOfComparisions() { return m_iComparisions; }
00041         static int GetNumOfExchanges() { return m_iExchanges; }
00042         static int GetNumOfIterations() { return m_iIterations; }
00043         static void ZeroStats() { m_iComparisions = 0; m_iExchanges = 0; m_iIterations = 0; }
00044 private:
00045         static int m_iComparisions;
00046         static int m_iExchanges;
00047         static int m_iIterations;
00048 
00049 protected:
00050         bool m_bRunning;
00051         char m_strName[64];             // it must be set in constructor
00052 };
